ygData.subject: Re: Kitting and magic
ygData.msgSnippet: I camped Drezlna this weekend for Jboots, and let me tell you, I have NO Plans to kite. I think it is ridiculous to kite. I would not risk putting other
ygData.messageBody:
I camped Drezlna this weekend for Jboots, and let me tell you, I have NO
Plans to kite. I think it is ridiculous to kite. I would not risk putting
other players in danger, if they happen to walk in the wrong area if I were
to do that. I wanted those boots so badly because I run from Neriak to Cazic
Thule enough times. Its cut my running time in half =)

Lanadina


>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>Reply-To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
>To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
>Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Kitting and magic
>Date: Mon, 05 Jul 1999 20:24:02 +0200
>
>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>I realy dont like kitting it is from my opinion a serious bug in a
>Artifical inteligence program! I see druids kitting all times around
>wizards waiting in najena for a Jboots all with idea to go kitte something
>and get exp fast! What you think about it?
>
>
>
>Silverion Dragonirder
>
>High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
